title: Number of pet birds in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of birds in millions, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2008 to 2000.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
